07-18-2024: - Active now adds +50% to your clip one time on cast. If you are reloading, it interrupts that process and gives you +50% to your clip.
06-20-2024: - Can now be cast while busy (such as while you are shooting)
06-13-2024: - Added new effects for {{ItemIcon|Item=Vampiric Burst|Size=20}} Vampiric Burst
05-10-2024: - Active {{ItemIcon|Item=Bullet Lifesteal|Size=20}} Bullet Lifesteal increased from 40% to 60%
